This website describes the PRC Data Challenge.

The Performance Review Commission was established in 1998 by EUROCONTROL’s
Permanent Commission.

It provides **objective** information and **independent** advice to EUROCONTROL’s
governing bodies on European air traffic management (ATM) performance.


You can find further details in the [AIU Portal PRC page][prcpage]
